participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and determined, Lily loves the thrill of racing and values her independence.
participant_1.background: i waitress during the day to supplement my income. i've light skin with big brown eyes. its red with blue stripe so it shiny when i race. my main transportation is my motorbike. i wear a motorbike helmet to protect my head.

participant_2.name: Emma
participant_2.personality: Caring and ambitious, Emma is focused on her studies and enjoys spending time with friends.
participant_2.background: i am in college to become a nurse. i have blonde hair and blue eyes. i recently got an apartment with my best friend. i do not like chicken. i work at a bar at night to pay for college.
